amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for disease programs related to HIV/AIDS by $10 million and decreases funding for the World Bank International Development Association accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the account for Agency for International Development Child Survival and Disease Programs Fund by $10,000,000 for prevention and treatment of HIV/AIDS. The increase would be offset by a similar reduction in the International Development Association.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
